trans-unit.source: Provides methods for a subscription service to manage subscriptions for a workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para que um serviço de assinatura gerencie assinaturas para um tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService> is the base class for any subscription service classes used in the Workflow Foundation (WF).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService> é a classe base para as classes de serviço de assinatura usado no Workflow Foundation (WF).

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.CreateSubscription(System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.DeleteSubscription(System.Guid)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" />, você deve substituir os seguintes membros: <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.CreateSubscription(System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.DeleteSubscription(System.Guid)" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" /> that the workflow runtime created.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" /> que o tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho criou.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> that the workflow runtime created the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> de que o tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho criou a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the subscription that the workflow runtime deleted.
trans-unit.target: O GUID da assinatura que o tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho excluiu.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> that the workflow runtime deleted the subscription associated with the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> de que o tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho excluiu a assinatura associada ao GUID especificado.
